occurrences.context: ... the plagues thereof. The Bible says very similarly in the book of Ezekiel, look over, if you will, Ezekiel 25. In Ezekiel 25, in verses 12 through 14, we read this judgment that is given again in this portion ...

... the plagues thereof. The Bible says very similarly in the book of Ezekiel, look over, if you will, Ezekiel 25. In Ezekiel 25, in verses 12 through 14, we read this judgment that is given again in this portion ...
